ing: 1/3 cup creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip â„¢
1 (8 ounce) can pineapple tidbits, juice reserved
des: "This delicious, fruity chicken salad is a change from the standard. It's easy to double the recipe for a larger group."
ins: In a medium bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Mix in salad dressing and 2 tablespoons reserved pineapple juice.  Stir in the pineapple tidbits, chicken, almonds, and grapes until evenly coated. Chill until serving.
